text: "Labelled with Love" is a 1981 song by British band Squeeze and is the third single from their fourth studio album East Side Story. It went to number 4 in the United Kingdom, number 2 in Ireland and number 46 in the Netherlands. ==Track listing== # "Labelled with Love" (4:44) # "Squabs on Forty Fab" (4:45) == References == Category:1981 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Country ballads Category:Squeeze (band) songs
title: Labelled with Love
